original_text: Jesus went on to say, “In a little while you will see me no more, and then after a little while you will see me.”
korean_text: 조금 있으면 너희가 나를 보지 못하겠고 또 조금 있으면 나를 보리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: you will see me no more
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나를 더 이상 보지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and then after a little while
